function.name: save_extract_blood_lab_results
function.description: Saves the extracted blood lab results

name.description: The name of the lab test (sometimes above a line describing which method was used to perform the text)

value.description: The value of the lab test

unit.description: The unit of the lab test

range_minimum.description: The range minimum of the lab test

range_maximum.description: The range maximum of the lab test
